    • Product

      public Product(int id, String name, double price, int quantity)
      Create a product with the given id, name, and price
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the product
      name - The name of the product
      price - The price of the product
      quantity - The quantity of the product @JsonProperty is used in serialization and deserialization of the JSON object to the Java object in mapping the fields. If a field is not provided in the JSON object, the Java field gets the default Java value, i.e. 0 for int
